column1: The serotonin test measures the level of serotonin in the blood.
Serotonin is a chemical produced by nerve cells.
Carcinoid syndrome is a group of symptoms associated with carcinoid tumors.
These are tumors of the small intestine, colon, appendix, and bronchial tubes in the lungs.
People with carcinoid syndrome often have high levels of serotonin in the blood.
